remarks: Special case of excluded middle for the singleton of a vector. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochexmidat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochexmidat.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochexmidat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochexmidat.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochexmidat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochexmidat.r $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dochexmidat.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dochexmidat.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochexmidat.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochexmidat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` { X } ) .(+) ( N ` { X } ) ) = V ) $.
